full_summary:
**40 Yard Garbage Truck**

**Reference Number:** WS4119528959-Doc4128390342
**Solicitation Number:** WS4119528959
**Publication Date:** August 9, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** October 4, 2023, 14:00 EDT
**Expected Contract Start Date:** September 29, 2023 (subject to change)
**Expected Contract End Date:** None (indeterminate)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Description:**
The Government of Canada is seeking bids from qualified offerors to provide One (1) 40 Yard Garbage Truck and related items to Correctional Service Canada (CSC) Kingston, Ontario.

**Regions of Delivery:**
The contract will be performed within Canada.

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is open to international bidders and is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Contact Information:**
For further information, please contact:

Matheson, Valerie (SPAC/PSPC)
valerie.matheson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Attachments:**
No attachments are available for this tender.

**Note:**
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on October 4, 2023, by 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will be declared non-responsive. I have improved the text while striving to maintain the original meaning. The result is a professional-looking entry in markdown format that contains all relevant information and excludes non-essential details.

The differences between the original and rewritten text include:

* Improved grammar and sentence structure
* Consolidated identical information into
